fields.description: Read-only property with details of the app-specific scope when the role eligibility or assignment is scoped to an app. Nullable.
fields.name: AppScope

fields.description: Identifier of the app-specific scope when the assignment or eligibility is scoped to an app. The scope of an assignment or eligibility determines the set of resources for which the principal has been granted access. App scopes are scopes that are defined and understood by this application only. Use / for tenant-wide app scopes. Use directoryScopeId to limit the scope to particular directory objects, for example, administrative units.
fields.name: AppScopeId

fields.description: Identifier of the object through which this schedule was created.
fields.name: CreatedUsing

fields.description: The directory object that is the scope of the role eligibility or assignment. Read-only.
fields.name: DirectoryScope

fields.description: Identifier of the directory object representing the scope of the assignment or eligibility. The scope of an assignment or eligibility determines the set of resources for which the principal has been granted access. Directory scopes are shared scopes stored in the directory that are understood by multiple applications. Use / for tenant-wide scope. Use appScopeId to limit the scope to an application only.
fields.name: DirectoryScopeId

fields.description: OData ID for `DirectoryScope` to bind to this entity
fields.name: DirectoryScope_ODataBind

fields.description: When the schedule was last modified.
fields.name: ModifiedDateTime

fields.description: The principal that's getting a role assignment or that's eligible for a role through the request.
fields.name: Principal

fields.description: Identifier of the principal that has been granted the role assignment or eligibility.
fields.name: PrincipalId

fields.description: OData ID for `Principal` to bind to this entity
fields.name: Principal_ODataBind

fields.description: Detailed information for the roleDefinition object that is referenced through the roleDefinitionId property.
fields.name: RoleDefinition

fields.description: Identifier of the unifiedRoleDefinition object that is being assigned to the principal or that a principal is eligible for.
fields.name: RoleDefinitionId

fields.description: The status of the role assignment or eligibility request.
fields.name: Status
